00066 const double MIN_VAL = 1e-100;

00070 RBFN_PTO::RBFN_PTO( unsigned nInputs,
00071                     unsigned nOutputs,
00072                     unsigned nCenters,
00073                     bool     trainkap )
00074   : RBFN( nInputs, nOutputs, nCenters ),
00075     kappa     ( nCenters ),
00076     dkappa    ( nCenters ),

00084 void RBFN_PTO::copyFrom( const array< double >& w )
00085 {
00086     SIZE_CHECK( w.nelem( ) == b.nelem( ) +
00087                               RBFN::A.nelem( ) +
00088                               m.nelem( ) +
00089                               v.nelem( ) +
00090                               kappa.nelem( ) )
00091 
00092     unsigned i, k;
00093 
00094     for( k = i = 0; i < b.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00095         b.elem( i ) = w( k );
00096     for( i = 0; i < RBFN::A.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00097         RBFN::A.elem( i ) = w( k );
00098     for( i = 0; i < m.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00099         m.elem( i ) = w( k );
00100     for( i = 0; i < v.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00101         v.elem( i ) = sqr( w( k ) );
00102     for( i = 0; i < kappa.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00103         kappa.elem( i ) = w( k );
00104 }

00106 void RBFN_PTO::copyTo( array< double >& w ) const
00107 {
00108     unsigned i, k;
00109 
00110     w.resize( b.nelem( ) +
00111               RBFN::A.nelem( ) +
00112               m.nelem( ) +
00113               v.nelem( ) +
00114               kappa.nelem( ) );
00115 
00116     for( k = i = 0; i < b.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00117         w( k ) = b.elem( i );
00118     for( i = 0; i < RBFN::A.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00119         w( k ) = RBFN::A.elem( i );
00120     for( i = 0; i < m.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00121         w( k ) = m.elem( i );
00122     for( i = 0; i < v.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00123         w( k ) = sqrt( v.elem( i ) );
00124     for( i = 0; i < kappa.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00125         w( k ) = kappa.elem( i );
00126 }

00128 void RBFN_PTO::copyGrad( array< double >& dw ) const
00129 {
00130     unsigned i, k;
00131 
00132     dw.resize( dB.nelem( ) +
00133                dA.nelem( ) +
00134                dm.nelem( ) +
00135                ds.nelem( ) +
00136                dkappa.nelem( ) );
00137 
00138     for( k = i = 0; i < dB.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00139         dw( k ) = dB.elem( i );
00140     for( i = 0; i < dA.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00141         dw( k ) = dA.elem( i );
00142     for( i = 0; i < dm.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00143         dw( k ) = dm.elem( i );
00144     for( i = 0; i < ds.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00145         dw( k ) = ds.elem( i );
00146     for( i = 0; i < dkappa.nelem( ); ++i, ++k )
00147         dw( k ) = dkappa.elem( i );
00148 }

00152 void RBFN_PTO::copyFrom( const MixtureOfGaussians& gm )
00153 {
00154     unsigned i, j, k;
00155     double   varg;
00156 
00157     for( i = 0; i < size( ); ++i ) {
00158         for( varg = 1, j = 0; j < dim( ); ++j ) {
00159             m( i, j ) = gm.m( i, j );
00160             varg *= ( v( i, j ) = std::max( gm.v( i, j ), MIN_VAL ) );
00161         }
00162 
00163         for( k = 0; j < gm.dim( ); ++j, ++k )
00164             RBFN::A( k, i ) = gm.m( i, j );
00165 
00166         kappa( i ) = gm.a( i ) / sqrt( varg );
00167     }
00168 
00169     b = 0;
00170 
00171     clear( );
00172 }

00175 
00176 void RBFN_PTO::firstLayer( const array< double >& x,
00177                            array< double >& ex ) const
00178 {
00179     SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) == 1 && x.dim( 0 ) == dim( ) )
00180 
00181     unsigned i, j;
00182     double   marg, norm;
00183 
00184     ex.resize( size( ) );
00185 
00186     for( norm = 0, i = 0; i < size( ); i++ ) {
00187         for( marg = 0, j = dim( ); j--; )
00188             marg -= sqr( x( j ) - m( i, j ) ) / std::max( v( i, j ), MIN_VAL );
00189         norm += ( ex( i ) = kappa( i ) * exp( marg / 2 ) );
00190     }
00191 
00192     ex /= norm;
00193 }

00197 void RBFN_PTO::gradientClear( )
00198 {
00199     dkappa.resize( kappa );
00200     dkappa = 0.;
00201     RBFN::gradientClear( );
00202 }

00206 //
00207 // nur fuer 1-dim. Ausgang !!!
00208 //
00209 void RBFN_PTO::gradientMSE( )
00210 {
00211     unsigned i, k, l;
00212     double s, t;
00213     array< double > e, Ae;
00214     array< double > tdB, tdA, tdk;
00215     array_reference< double > x, y;
00216 
00217     for( l = 0; ; ++l ) {
00218         if( _x->ndim( ) == 2 ) {
00219             x.copyReference( ( *_x )[ l ] );
00220             y.copyReference( ( *_y )[ l ] );
00221         } else {
00222             x.copyReference( *_x );
00223             y.copyReference( *_y );
00224         }
00225 
00226         firstLayer( x, e );
00227 
00228         Ae  = inner_product( RBFN::A, e );
00229         dB += ( tdB = ( Ae + b - y ) * 2. );
00230         dA += ( tdA = outer_product( tdB, e ) );
00231         tdk.resize( size( ) );
00232 
00233         for( k = 0; k < size( ); ++k ) {
00234             dkappa( k ) += ( tdk( k ) = dA( 0, k ) * ( RBFN::A( 0, k ) - Ae( 0 ) ) ) / kappa( k );
00235             for( i = 0; i < dim( ); ++i ) {
00236                 s  = sqrt( v( k, i ) );
00237                 t  = x( i ) - m( k, i );
00238 
00239                 dm( k, i ) += tdk( k ) * t / ( s*s );
00240                 ds( k, i ) += tdk( k ) * ( t*t ) / ( s*s*s );
00241             }
00242         }
00243 
00244         err += sumOfSqr( tdB / 2. );
00245 
00246         if( _x->ndim( ) == 1 || l+1 >= _x->dim( 0 ) )
00247             break;
00248     }
00249 }
